data.title: Comedian Tommy Davidson’s Trans Son (F2M) Goes Viral (Handsome)
data.meta_description: Comedian Tommy Davidson has a trans son - who was born with female body parts. His son transitioned and now walks around as a full blown man.
data.text:
Comedian Tommy Davidson has a trans son – who was born with female body parts. His son transitioned during his teenage years, and now walks around as a full blown man.

Tommy showed off his son recently on Instagram, and women all over social media are marveling at just how gorgeous he is.

Fans of Tommy’s son – who goes by the name Jerzey Saint Wilson – seem to be pretty dedicated to the new man. He’s practically un-clockable.

Tommy Davidson is currently married to his second wife. Amanda Moore. The two have been married since 2015, together they have two children.

Jerzey was born from Tommy’s first wife, a Black woman named Desiree Davidson.

Here’s Jerzey before he underwent the transition:

Tommy is an American actor and comedian. He was an original cast member on the sketch comedy TV show In Living Color, Mitchell on Between Brothers (1997–1999), Dexter on Malcolm & Eddie (1999–2000), Oscar Proud on The Proud Family (2001–2005) and its 2022 revival, Rushon in Booty Call (1997), Womack in Bamboozled (2000), and Cream Corn in Black Dynamite (2009) and its subsequent television series. In 2022, Davidson appeared on Storybound reading from his book, Living in Color: What’s Funny about Me.
